name: Role Of The Dice (srujanpant, kunal negi, dokutaiyo)
name_original: Role Of The Dice (srujanpant, kunal negi, dokutaiyo)
description:
The game follows the story of a factory outlet dice who wishes to become the "Most Probable Dice" in the dice underworld. The dice underworld is not a welcoming place, specially for an "ordinary" dice. But this is not enough to stop you! You must defeat all the enemies in your path and succeed in this challenge!

Hope you enjoy the game :)
